name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Boil pasta according to package instructions.
Chop and sauté broccoli in olive oil.
Mix pasta with tomatoes and cooked broccoli.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Chop and sauté onion, garlic, broccoli, and peppers.
Mix cooked noodles with the sautéed vegetables.
Serve warm!

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Chop onion and garlic.
Cook chicken with curry powder until browned.
Add tomatoes and simmer until chicken is tender.
Serve with rice or bread.

name: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough.
Add mozzarella slices on top.
Bake in the oven for 12-15 minutes.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef in a skillet until browned.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, and cheese.
Serve immediately!

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Chop tomatoes, onion, and garlic.
Cook them together in a pot until softened.
Blend the mixture until smooth and add cream.
Serve hot.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter two slices of bread on one side.
Place cheese between the unbuttered sides.
Grill on a skillet until golden brown.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread slices.
Mash avocado and spread it on toast.
Season with salt and pepper.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté shrimp and garlic in butter until shrimp is pink.
Mix with pasta and serve.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons, Caesar dressing, and grated Parmesan.
Toss to combine and serve.

name: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: Chop onion and garlic.
Cook them with tomatoes and beans.
Add chili powder and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Pan-Seared Salmon
instructions: Sear salmon in butter until cooked through.
Add garlic and lemon juice while cooking.
Serve with your favorite sides.

name: Breakfast Burrito
instructions: Scramble eggs and cook sausage.
Place eggs, sausage, and cheese on a tortilla.
Wrap and serve.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Cook ground beef with garlic and onion.
Mix with tomato sauce and serve over spaghetti.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Layer with basil leaves on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and serve.
